description: Weekly episode reviews, "Explained" articles, and Power Rankings.

items.title: Jujutsu Kaisen: Season 3 (The Culling Game)
items.hype: The "Culling Game" is a battle royale arc introducing highly complex powers. Users are actively searching for "Culling Game rules explained" and "New character abilities."
items.contentAngle: "Weekly Death Watch" (Who survives?) and Power System breakdowns.

items.title: Frieren: Beyond Journey’s End (Season 2)
items.hype: The first season was a global phenomenon. Season 2 continues the "First Class Mage" journey. It dominates "slice of life" and "fantasy" discussions.
items.contentAngle: "Cozy" reviews vs. "Lore Deep Dives" (analyzing the magic system).

items.title: Fire Force (Season 3 - Part 2 / Finale)
items.hype: This is the grand finale. The visuals are psychedelic and high-octane.
items.contentAngle: Connection to Soul Eater (fan theories are huge here) and the final "Great Cataclysm."

description: "Preview" articles in March, "First Impressions" in April.

items.title: One Piece: Elbaph Arc
items.hype: The most anticipated arc in decades. The Straw Hats finally reach the land of Giants.
items.contentAngle: "Elbaph Lore Drops" (Shanks, Giants, Void Century). This will be the #1 traffic driver of Spring.

items.title: Dorohedoro (Season 2)
items.hype: A cult classic with a unique "grimy" aesthetic that fits your "Dark/Frost" website theme perfectly.
items.contentAngle: "Why you need to watch Dorohedoro" (Recommendation lists).

items.title: Bleach: Thousand-Year Blood War (Part 4 - The Calamity)
items.contentAngle: "The End of an Era" – Recap of Ichigo’s 20-year journey.

items.title: The Detective Is Already Dead (Season 2)
items.details: The first movie released July 2025. Fans are expecting news on Part 2 by late 2026.
items.hype: Visually stunning character designs (Siesta) drive massive social media engagement (Pinterest/Instagram traffic).
